title: T210 16 card Ft Worth team set
author: bnorth

posts.post_title: T210 16 card Ft Worth team set
posts.post_content: Here is a chance to get the entire team at one time. $1625 PPFF shipped in a USPS small flat rate box. The Belew card isn't paper loss it still has parts of the scrapbook page attached to it. Not sure why the backs are weird looking in the last picture.
Would also be interested in a cash/trade deal for a lower end T210 Series 2 Jackson, Lynchburg and $1215 for the entire 16 card Ft Worth team set. My best cash price is $1375 for the Ft Worth cards.
I would break it up and sell singles or smaller group. If interested make an offer on card(s) you want.
